cosmos.cosmos_cluster.Cluster¶

class cosmos.cosmos_cluster.Cluster(name)[source]¶

Conditionally run models.

Conditions: 1. topn: sort models by boundary total water level and only simulate the Top N (keyword: topn) models. 2. threshold: only run model if boundary total water level exceeds a threshold (keyword: boundary_twl_treshold). 3. ensemble_threshold : always run model for “best track”, but ensemble only if boundary threshold (keyword: boundary_twl_treshold) is exceeded.

__init__(name)[source]¶

Initialize cluster class.
